hopobject.name: XBMC
hopobject.body: XBMC is a full-featured multimedia center that runs on many current operating systems and platforms. There is currently work underway to get it working on ARM via OpenGL ES2.0. There exists a POC of XBMC running on the BeagleBoard seen here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CYq7f-CrnOc
hopobject.shortdesc: XBMC is a full-featured multimedia center that runs on many current operating systems and platforms
